Message:
Soon after, the town lit up,
and the Holy Night began.

In the end,
I couldn’t find the perfect gift
to show my gratitude...
But, I still can’t wait
to see Mister Apprentice tonight.

Because...there’s so much
I want to tell him about.

Like, investigating the mystery
of the Holy Night’s miracle
with Stella,

how dusty the library was
when I went back home,
or how sweeping
all those spellbooks
was such a daunting task...

And not to mention all the snow
inside the mansion—
I’m sure that’ll surprise him.
Or maybe it’ll just make him laugh.

Just thinking about how
I should tell these stories,
along with imagining
what kind of faces
you’ll make in response...
Hehe!

I may not have prepared
a special gift,
but I have a feeling
it’ll be a wonderful Holy Night.
I’m sure of it.
